message: Name,

You are invited to our very first CLE Accredited Justia Webinar! On January 18 at 2:00pm ET/11:00am PT, JurisPro Expert Witness Directory President Jim Robinson will offer a virtual CLE and webinar opportunity on Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses* exclusively for Justia Connect members.
One hour of general California MCLE credit is offered as an exclusive Justia Connect Pro benefit. Other jurisdictions may award credit case-by-case through the self-submission process.
If you are not a Justia Connect Pro but wish to attend this webinar for CLE credit, you can upgrade to Pro for only $19.99/month at connect.justia.com/pro.
Not a Justia Connect Pro? You can still learn from a leader in expert witness research!
note: *This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.
